Reviews.Title: “Good for sleeping”
Reviews.Author: Mihai1
Reviews.Content: A few steps from Roma Termini train station which is in the centre of the City, so we can visit everything by foot. The room are good only for sleeping. During the night some dubious guys were on the street but there wasn't any problem

Reviews.Title: “Bare Bones, very Close to Termini”
Reviews.Author: I-luv-Edinburgh
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this place was how close it was to the Termini, less than a minutes walk. lots of restaurants and attractions in walking distance. Place itself is nothing fancy, the whole place had a musty smell about it. Small bed rooms, small bathrooms. If you just want a place to sleep and if you're not too fussy, this is the place for you. It is economical, well located and easy to travel to and from. We only stayed here 2 nights, so it was OK, wouldn't recommend it you need to stay longer than 2 nights! It was run by the cutest little couple, they were really really old and the husband seemed to be doing most of the cleaning, they are wonderful, but do not speak much English. There seemed to be a much better looking Hotel on the 2nd floor of the same building, cant remember the name though...

HotelInfo.Name: Locanda Otello
HotelInfo.Address: Via Marghera 13, 00185 Rome, Italy
